Key.Original: Leu (PDR)
Key.English: Leu (PDR)
Key.Russian: Лей (ПДР)

Key.Original: Leu (Moldova)
Key.English: Leu (Moldova)
Key.Russian: Лей (Молдова)

Key.Original: No ore found in the loading zone
Key.English: No ore found in the loading zone
Key.Russian: Не найдено руды в зоне погрузки.

Key.Original: Ore has been processed! You can take your pay from the cash register. Your Work Fatique has increased.
Key.English: Ore has been processed! You can take your pay from the cash register. Your Work Fatique has increased.
Key.Russian: Руда переработана! Можете забрать оплату из кассы. Усталость от Работы увеличена.

Key.Original: Process Hay
Key.English: Process Hay
Key.Russian: Переработать Сено

Key.Original: No hay found in the loading zone
Key.English: No hay found in the loading zone
Key.Russian: Не найдено сена в зоне погрузки.

Key.Original: Hay has been processed! You can take your pay from the cash register. Your Work Fatique has increased.
Key.English: Hay has been processed! You can take your pay from the cash register. Your Work Fatique has increased.
Key.Russian: Сено переработано! Можете забрать оплату из кассы. Усталость от Работы увеличена.

Key.Original: Produce Goods
Key.English: Produce Goods
Key.Russian: Произвести Товар

Key.Original: No Agricultural Products found or no Ore found in their corresponding boxes.
Key.English: No Agricultural Products found or no Ore found in their corresponding boxes.
Key.Russian: Не найдено Сельхоз Продукции или Руды в соответствующих им ящиках.

Key.Original: Goods have been produced! You can take your pay from the cash register. Your Work Fatique has increased.
Key.English: Goods have been produced! You can take your pay from the cash register. Your Work Fatique has increased.
Key.Russian: Товар произведен! Можете забрать оплату из кассы. Усталость от Работы увеличена.

Key.Original: Factory doesn't have enough money to pay for this work.
Key.English: Factory doesn't have enough money to pay for this work.
Key.Russian: У Завода не хватает денег чтобы оплатить эту работу.

Key.Original: Cook Lunch
Key.English: Cook Lunch
Key.Russian: Приготовить Обед

Key.Original: No agricultural products found in the box
Key.English: No agricultural products found in the box
Key.Russian: Не найдено сельхоз продукции в ящике.

Key.Original: Lunch has been cooked and put into the case.
Key.English: Lunch has been cooked and put into the case.
Key.Russian: Обед приготовлен и добавлен в кейс.

Key.Original: Pay for Fuel.
Key.English: Pay for Fuel.
Key.Russian: Оплатить топливо.

Key.Original: Put appropriate money into the box to pay for Fuel.
Key.English: Put appropriate money into the box to pay for Fuel.
Key.Russian: Положите подходящие деньги в ящик чтобы оплатить Топливо.

Key.Original: Paid:%1 %2\nFuel added to the Pump:%3 liters
Key.English: Paid:%1 %2\nFuel added to the Pump:%3 liters
Key.Russian: Оплачено:%1 %2\nТоплива добавлено в Колонку:%3 литра

Key.Original: WARNING! Could not fully fulfill order. Maybe fuel storage is empty or the pump is overflowing.\n%1 %2 of change have been added back to the money box.
Key.English: WARNING! Could not fully fulfill order. Maybe fuel storage is empty or the pump is overflowing.\n%1 %2 of change have been added back to the money box.
Key.Russian: ВНИМАНИЕ! Не удалось полностью выполнить заказ. Возможно хранилище топлива опустело или колонка переполнена.\n%1 %2 сдачи положены обратно в кейс с деньгами.

Key.Original: Yes
Key.English: Yes
Key.Russian: Да

Key.Original: No
Key.English: No
Key.Russian: Нет

Key.Original: Check own Stats
Key.English: Check own Stats
Key.Russian: Посмотреть свои Статы

Key.Original:
Had Lunch Today: %1
Work Fatigue: %2%%
Debt (PDR): %3
Debt (Moldova): %4
Key.English:
Had Lunch Today: %1
Work Fatigue: %2%%
Debt (PDR): %3
Debt (Moldova): %4
Key.Russian:
Ел Обед Сегодня: %1
Усталость от Работы: %2%%
Долг (ПДР): %3
Долг (Молдова): %4

Key.Original: You have accumulated too much Work Fatique for the day and can't do this action.
Key.English: You have accumulated too much Work Fatique for the day and can't do this action.
Key.Russian: Вы накопили слишком много Усталости от Работы за день и не можете совершить это действие.
